texts.title: Greetings and Introductions
texts.content:
Hello! My name is Andrew.
I'm from Brazil. I am the creator of Inglês Moleza! Nice to meet you!


When you meet someone new, it's essential to greet them.
You can say: 'Hi', 'Hello', or 'Hey there'. These are all friendly ways to start a conversation.


When you want to introduce yourself, you can say: 'My name is [ your-name ]'.
For example: 'My name is Andrew'. It's a polite way to let people know who you are.


It's also common to ask for someone's name. You can say: 'What's your name?'
When they tell you, be sure to say: 'Nice to meet you!' to make them feel welcome.


Greetings and introductions are the first step in making new friends.
So, don't be shy. Start with a friendly 'Hello!' and a warm smile.
texts.glossary:
Hello: olá

my name is: meu nome é

nice to meet you: é um prazer te conhecer

it's essential to greet them: é essencial cumprimentá-los

start a conversation: iniciar uma conversa

to introduce yourself: introduzir-se, apresentar-se

a polite way: uma maneira educada

it's also common: também é comum

to ask for someone's name: perguntar o nome de alguém

be sure to say: certifique-se de dizer

greetings: saudações

introductions: introduções, apresentações

making new friends: fazer novos amigos

don't be shy: não tenha vergonha

texts.title: My Daily Routine
texts.content:
I wake up at 7:00 AM every morning. First, I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then, I have breakfast. I usually eat cereal and drink orange juice.


After breakfast, I get dressed for the day. I put on my school uniform because I go to school. My school starts at 8:30 AM, so I have to leave home early.


At school, I study different subjects like math, English, and science. I have lunch with my friends in the school cafeteria. After school, I like to play soccer with my friends in the park.


In the evening, I do my homework. It's important to finish my homework before dinner. After that, I have dinner with my family. We talk about our day and share stories.


Before bed, I read a book for a little while. It helps me relax. Then, I go to sleep around 9:00 PM. That's my daily routine!
texts.glossary:
I wake up: eu acordo

I brush my teeth: eu escovo meus dentes

and wash my face: e lavo meu rosto
